strategy: Type of strategy: centralized or federated

centralized.model_name: Name of the model class: Sinple_rnn
centralized.data: path to the time series data
centralized.distributed: true or false if false time series will be distribute

federated.model_name: Name of the model class: Sinple_rnn
federated.data: path to the time series data
federated.distributed: true or false if false time series will be distribute
